segments.text: Can you send someone to fix my internet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you having a problem with it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My internet is having problems connecting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me how long your internet has been messing up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've been having this problem for the last few days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will the internet even pop up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It'll pop up , but it won't connect to a webpage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since the internet isn't broken , your connection must be messed up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think you can send somebody over to fix it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you'd like , I can send someone to fix it right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will it be till they get here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It should be no longer than an hour .
segments.speaker: S2
